articles.title: Quartararo's first-ever 'real test' is a great sign for Yamaha - The Race
articles.description: The first "real test" of his career is how 2021 MotoGP champion Fabio Quartararo described his and Yamaha's start to 2023 testing at Sepang.
articles.content: A low-key start to 2023 MotoGP testing as far as the timesheets were concerned did not match Fabio Quartararo’s enthusiasm, the 2021 champion describing his and Yamaha’s first day at Sepang as the fi… [+5113 chars]

articles.author: Gabriel Tan
articles.title: Amid Al Nassr's Cristiano Ronaldo's hype, Al Hilal can show they remain Saudi Arabia's top team in FIFA Club World Cup final vs. Real Madrid - ESPN India
articles.description: For all the hype Cristiano Ronaldo is generating Al Nassr, Al Hilal can show they remain Saudi Arabia's top team against Real Madrid on Saturday.
articles.content:
It would not be an overstatement to say that global interest in Saudi Arabian football -- and the Saudi Pro League -- has increased hundredfold in the past month or so.
